title: "API Reference"

## Python API

Use `import justembed as je`. Version 0.1.1.

### Workspace

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.register_workspace(path)` | Register a workspace (does not delete data) |
| `je.deregister_workspace(path, confirm=True)` | Remove from registry |
| `je.list_workspaces()` | List registered workspaces |

### Server

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.begin(workspace, port=5424, host="127.0.0.1")` | Start server (blocks) |
| `je.begin(..., background=True)` | Start in background |
| `je.begin(..., open_browser=True)` | Open browser after start |
| `je.terminate(port)` | Stop server |
| `je.list_servers()` | List active servers |

### Models

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.train_model(name, training_data, embedding_dim=128, max_features=5000)` | Train custom model. `training_data` = file path or list of strings |
| `je.list_models()` | List models (default E5 + custom) |
| `je.delete_model(name, confirm=True)` | Delete custom model |

### Knowledge Bases

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.create_kb(name, model="default")` | Create KB. `model` = `"default"` (E5) or custom model name |
| `je.list_kbs()` | List KBs with model and chunk count |
| `je.delete_kb(name, confirm=True)` | Delete KB |

### Documents

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.add(kb, path=...)` | Add file or folder (.txt, .md) |
| `je.add(kb, text=...)` | Add raw text |
| `je.add(kb, paths=[...])` | Add multiple files |
| `je.add(kb, documents=[{"text": "...", "filename": "..."}])` | Add from dicts |
| `je.add(..., max_tokens=300, merge_threshold=50)` | Chunking options |
| `je.list_history()` | Upload history |

### Query

| Function | Description |
|----------|-------------|
| `je.query(text, kb="all", top_k=5, min_score=0.0)` | Search. `kb` = name, list of names, or `"all"` |

Returns list of dicts: `{text, score, kb, file, chunk_index, model}`.

## Example

```python
import justembed as je

je.register_workspace("~/my_docs")
je.begin(workspace="~/my_docs")

je.create_kb("docs")
je.add(kb="docs", path="report.txt")
results = je.query("summary", kb="docs", top_k=5)
```

## CLI

```bash
justembed begin --workspace ~/docs [--port 5424] [--host 127.0.0.1]
```
